name: Seurat clustering
description: Run the Seurat clustering algorithm on your single-cell data. Prior to clustering, this uses principal-component analysis (PCA) to reduce the dimension of the data.

raw_counts.description: The input raw count matrix. Must be an integer-based table.
raw_counts.name: Count matrix:

pca_dims.description: The number of dimensions to retain in the PCA projection. Fewer dimensions can lose information and skew results.
pca_dims.name: Number of PCA dimensions:
